# iosxr_aaa_accounting (Resource)

This resource can manage the AAA Accounting configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_aaa_accounting" "example" {
  update_newinfo = true
  exec = [
    {
      list       = "AAA-EXEC"
      start_stop = true
      a1_tacacs  = true
      a2_radius  = true
      a3_group   = "AAA3"
      a4_none    = true
    }
  ]
  commands = [
    {
      list       = "AAA-COMMANDS"
      start_stop = true
      a1_tacacs  = true
      a2_group   = "AAA2"
      a3_local   = true
      a4_none    = true
    }
  ]
  system = [
    {
      list       = "AAA-SYSTEM"
      start_stop = true
      a1_tacacs  = true
      a2_radius  = true
      a3_group   = "AAA3"
      a4_none    = true
    }
  ]
  network = [
    {
      list       = "AAA-NETWORK"
      start_stop = true
      a1_tacacs  = true
      a2_radius  = true
      a3_group   = "AAA3"
      a4_none    = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `commands` (Attributes List) List name for AAA accounting (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--commands))
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `exec` (Attributes List) List name for AAA accounting (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--exec))
- `network` (Attributes List) List name for AAA accounting (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--network))
- `system` (Attributes List) List name for AAA accounting (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--system))
- `update_newinfo` (Boolean) Update records for new accountable information only
- `update_periodic` (Number) Update records at periodic intervals
  - Range: `1`-`35791394`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--commands"></a>
### Nested Schema for `commands`

Required:

- `list` (String) List name for AAA accounting

Optional:

- `a1_group` (String) server-group name
- `a1_local` (Boolean) Use local password for accounting
- `a1_none` (Boolean) No accounting
- `a1_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a1_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a2_group` (String) server-group name
- `a2_local` (Boolean) Use local password for accounting
- `a2_none` (Boolean) No accounting
- `a2_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a2_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a3_group` (String) server-group name
- `a3_local` (Boolean) Use local password for accounting
- `a3_none` (Boolean) No accounting
- `a3_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a3_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a4_group` (String) server-group name
- `a4_local` (Boolean) Use local password for accounting
- `a4_none` (Boolean) No accounting
- `a4_radius` (Boolean) Use list of all RADIUS hosts
- `a4_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `start_stop` (Boolean) Start and stop accounting
- `stop_only` (Boolean) Stop only accounting

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_aaa_accounting.example ""
```
